FuncDef: The display mice-elephant-flow flow-cache command is used to query flow table statistics. The display mice-elephant-flow flow-cache command is used to query flow table statistics. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: display mice-elephant-flow flow-cache ipv4 [ sip <ipv4-sip-address> | dip <ipv4-dip-address> | srcport <srcport-number> | dstport <dstport-number> | protocol <protocol-number> | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> | vni <vni-id> ] slot <slot-id>

display mice-elephant-flow flow-cache ipv6 [ sip <ipv6-sip-address> | dip <ipv6-dip-address> | srcport <srcport-number> | dstport <dstport-number> | protocol <protocol-number> | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> | vni <vni-id> ] slot <slot-id>

display mice-elephant-flow flow-cache ipv4 [ sip <ipv4-sip-address> | dip <ipv4-dip-address> | srcport <srcport-number> | dstport <dstport-number> | protocol <protocol-number> | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> ] slot <slot-id>

display mice-elephant-flow flow-cache ipv6 [ sip <ipv6-sip-address> | dip <ipv6-dip-address> | srcport <srcport-number> | dstport <dstport-number> | protocol <protocol-number> | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> ] slot <slot-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the source IPv4 address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies a source IPv6 address.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Specifies a destination IPv4 address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the destination IPv6 address.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Specifies the source port number.
The value is an integer in the range of 0 to 65535.

Specifies the destination port number.
The value is an integer in the range of 0 to 65535.

Specifies the protocol type.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 255.

Displays information about a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies a VNI.

 NOTE: This parameter is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.
The value is an integer in the range from 0 to 16777215.

Specifies the slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mice-elephant-flow flow-cache ipv4 sip 192.168.1.2 slot 1
<HUAWEI> display mice-elephant-flow flow-cache ipv4 sip 192.168.1.2 slot 1
